g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_4f71aabe-985f-46e9-ad46-d1319b9efec8
g.text: 162 [when: install_aide|bool and (not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and (ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy" or ansible_lsb.codename == "hirsute")))not aidecron.stat.exists]

g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_ce2fabd6-f7ca-453a-b097-2cbe77b6a212
g.text: 168 [when: install_aide|bool and (not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and (ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy" or ansible_lsb.codename == "hirsute")))ansible_os_family == "RedHat" and not rhelaidedb.stat.exists]
